### Table 1: Participant characteristics

#Importing dataset
```{r}
aha_ppt <- read_excel("~/Desktop/UAB/AHA CDA/AHA-Updated/AHA-CDA Code/Participant_Characteristics.xlsx")
dim(aha_ppt)
```

# Cleaning the dataset
```{R}
aha_ppt2 <- aha_ppt %>% 
  filter(!(ID %in% c("100", "105", "107", "111", "112", "118", "119", "127", "132", "134", "136", "152", "154")))
dim(aha_ppt2)
View(aha_ppt2)
```

# T-test 
```{r}
# Dipping Status and Body weight
t.test(BodyWeight ~ DippingStatus, data = aha_ppt2)

summary_bodywt <- aha_ppt2 %>%
  group_by(DippingStatus) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_bodywt = mean(BodyWeight, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_bodywt = sd(BodyWeight, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
print(summary_bodywt)
mean(aha_ppt2$BodyWeight)
sd(aha_ppt2$BodyWeight)
```
